packs.pack_description:
Fixes Inner Piston texture hole to match the arm size.
Colorful Slimes have this enabled by default, so no need to select this if you have selected colorful slimes!
Fixes miss placed pixel in the bottom of the smoker.
Changes the Observer's top texture to fit in-line with the 1.14 default textures, as it was left out in that update.
Adds some extra pixels to the Redstone Wire texture to make sure the whole line joins up.
Fixes an issue where the Big Dripleaf's stem pokes through the leaf when tilted.
Adds the gold trim to blank decorated pot sides to match the decorated sides.
Moves empty, Water, Lava and Powder Snow Buckets down by 1 pixel to make them consistent with Fix and Axolotl Buckets.
Recolors the water inside the Tadpole Bucket to match the rest of the Water and Fish buckets.
Recolors the oars on all boat items to match the boat color itself.
Recolors the bottom of cacti to match the rest of the cactus.
Changes the textures on all the cocoa beans stages to use proper proportions.
Makes Bamboo Planks and Bamboo Mosaics match the textures of the other plank types.
Recolors Scaffolding to use Bamboo and String colors to reflect its crafting recipe.
Adds nose-pieces to the helmet items that are missing them (iron, gold & diamond).
Brightens the Rib Armor Trim to match  the coloring of the other armor trims.
Retextures the beams of hanging signs to logs to match signs' posts.
Replaces the Soul Campfire's 'ash' texture with Soul Soil for consistency.
Fixes the Blaze's rods' color on the bottom face.
Replaces the solid block parts in leaves to a darker green when having fancy leaves disabled.
Gives the Smooth Stone texture the same bevel as its slab counterpart.
Gives double slab variants of some blocks a clear line of seperation.
Fixes the incorrect color on the handles of iron and stone hoes.
Retextures the Bat's texture to be consistent with its size.
Retextures the Ghast's texture to be consistent with its size.
Retextures the Elder Guardian's  texture to be consistent with its size.
Retextures the Wither's texture to be consistent with its size.
Retextures all sign textures to be consistent with their size.
Retextures Experience Orbs' textures to be consistent with their sizes.
Retextures Beacon and End Gateway beam's textures to be consistent with their sizes.
Retextures the Warden's 'SonicBoom' particle texture to be consistent with its size.
Retextures the Guardian beam's textures to be consistent with its sizes.
Fixes model of Villagers, Witches and Evokers so the cloak includes the missing bottom pixels.
